2.5.1.name: wordpress/facebook-photos-auto-gallery
2.5.1.description:
Facebook Photos Auto Gallery plugin is very flexible for you to display your facebook tagged photos in your website powered by wordpress. There are several options that you can update from the admin. You can control the size(width, height) and speed of your photo gallery.

Features

  • FB tagged photos
  • config page
  • options page
  • shortcode
  • simple to use and update
